summary: This document outlines the Aircraft Purchase Agreement between Hyperion Air, LLC and Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC for the sale of a 2008 Keystone (Sikorsky) S-76C++ helicopter. It details the terms of sale, including the purchase price, conditions of the aircraft, and responsibilities of both parties. The agreement includes provisions for escrow, inspections, and warranties.

persons.name: Darren K. Indyke
persons.context: Darren K. Indyke is the authorized representative for Hyperion Air, LLC, involved in the execution of the Aircraft Purchase Agreement.

persons.name: Rich Munkvold
persons.context: Rich Munkvold is the authorized representative for Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC, involved in the execution of the Aircraft Purchase Agreement.

persons.name: Larry Visoski
persons.context: Larry Visoski is mentioned as a manager and is involved in the closing process and documentation related to the aircraft sale.

persons.name: Melissa Koboldt
persons.context: Melissa Koboldt is the escrow agent for AIC Title Service, responsible for managing the escrow process related to the aircraft sale.

connections.description: Both are authorized representatives for their respective companies involved in the aircraft purchase agreement.
Darren K. Indyke is the authorized representative of Hyperion Air, LLC, while Larry Visoski is mentioned as a manager involved in the transaction.
Rich Munkvold, as the representative of Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC, interacts with Melissa Koboldt, the escrow agent for AIC Title Service.

events.title: Aircraft Purchase Agreement Signed
events.description: The Aircraft Purchase Agreement between Hyperion Air, LLC and Industrial Integrity Solutions, LLC was signed.

events.title: Closing Date
events.description: The closing of the aircraft sale is scheduled to take place by this date.

keyFacts: The purchase price for the helicopter is set at $1,800,000.
The aircraft is sold in 'as-is, where-is' condition with no warranties except for those expressly stated.
The agreement includes provisions for a pre-purchase inspection and a certificate of technical acceptance.
